channel.title: Restarter Command
channel.description: Ok, is there a way for someone else by typeing a command or something that can restart my server? Sometimes my server crashes, and im not there, so the people have to wait like 20-30 minutes till the server auto restarts, and i some times loose people like that :(

item.title: Restarter Command
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }

Read full topic
